citations.narrative:
Pest control. Several house flies are present in the guinea pig building. Flies and other insect pests can spread bacteria
and other disease causing organisms, contaminate food and other surfaces by defecating on them, and stress the guinea
pig population. There were no pest control devices in place to control the flies. An effective pest control program must be
established and maintained to protect the health of the guinea pigs. Correct by May 17, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.31(c) 
   
Sanitation. 
Pest control. Several house flies are present in the guinea pig building. Flies and other insect pests can spread bacteria 
and other disease causing organisms, contaminate food and other surfaces by defecating on them, and stress the guinea 
pig population. There were no pest control devices in place to control the flies. An effective pest control program must be 
established and maintained to protect the health of the guinea pigs. Correct by May 17, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
